captions.text:
[M] So, Dr. Meemersworth just discovered the concept 
 of running water. (Dr. Meemersworth discovers water)
She's like... (Note: "she" is really a "he") [Dr.M] This is the greatest thing.
[M] She doesn't quite understand how it works. She keeps dunking her head under.
(Simon laughs) [Dr.M] What? I don't understand. [S] Meemers.

[Dr.M] I feel wet and uncomfortable. What the? [S] Your 
 head... [M] No, Meemers, no. [S] Meemers, no.

[S] Sorry guys, our sink is a little bit wet. Look, look 
 at Meemers' head. [Dr.M] I don't understand. (Both laugh) [S] Shut...Meemers.

[M] And then she gets angry and hits it. 
 What are you doing? Don't get me wet.

Hmmm, little one. You're just gettin' your little head wet. Now she's grumpy 
 at it, and then she stuck her whole head under, Simon.
[S] Ok, we've gotta go live. You ready?
[M] No, what time is it? [S] It's 11:59.
Thanks for watching Meemers on Open The Happy! (Upbeat OpenTheHappy music)

title: Dr. Meemersworth the Scottish Fold Kitten Drinking Tap Water
